card_name: Prey On The Frailty of Strength
rules_text:
Incarnate {4}{B} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If a token was sacrificed this way, you gain 3 life.
